title: About Emily
body:

   CERTIFICATIONS  Project Management Professional (PMPÂ®)ï¼š See credential   EXPERIENCE Principal Administrator, MStar Semiconductor, 2012-2018   Requirement Management : Import and execute the workflow and system for projects. Monitoring and reporting the operation status to top manager.
